revised_title: Reassessment and Classification of Trinucleidae Morphology and Evolution
tldr: The authors reassess the morphology and classification of the Trinucleidae family of trilobites, proposing a new subfamilial classification based on new interpretations of cephalic morphology. They discuss the evolution of the family and its distribution in relation to recent palaeogeographic reconstructions. The study includes a list of current generic assignments for known species and a review of the relations between phylogeny and ontogeny.
